channel.title: Minnesota AG Press Releases
channel.description: Latest press releases from the Minnesota Attorney General's Office

item.title: Owner of manufactured home community to pay $135,000 to settle False Claims Act and other state law violations
item.description:
Publication Date: June 12, 2025

Sun Communities sought to evict tenants after promising not to in order to receive RentHelp funds

https://www.ag.state.mn.us/Office/Communications/2025/06/12_SunCommunities.asp
